verbs.description: If [ARG0: Trump] [V: cared] [ARG1: about increasing productivity and growth — rather than redistributing wealth upward] — he would increase social spending , not cut it .
If Trump cared about [V: increasing] [ARG1: productivity and growth] — rather than redistributing wealth upward — he would increase social spending , not cut it .
If Trump cared about increasing productivity and growth — rather than [V: redistributing] [ARG1: wealth] [ARG2: upward] — [ARG0: he] would increase social spending , not cut it .
If Trump cared about increasing productivity and growth — rather than redistributing wealth upward — he [V: would] increase social spending , not cut it .
[ARGM-ADV: If Trump cared about increasing productivity and growth — rather than redistributing wealth upward] — [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: increase] [ARG1: social spending] , not cut it .

[ARGM-ADV: If Trump cared about increasing productivity and growth — rather than redistributing wealth upward] — [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] increase social spending , [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: cut] [ARG1: it] .
